alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 9:33PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bullock and central Barbour Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 932 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Midway, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Clayton, Osco, Gaino, White Oak, Comer, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Millers Ford, Batesville, Clayton Municipal Airport and Mount Andrew. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
